short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extends the Developer Tools, adding a sidebar that helps to use emmet abbreviations and inject code into selected DOM element.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extends the Developer Tools, adding a sidebar that helps to use emmet abbreviations with previewer  and inject code into selected DOM element, and also useful in below operations.
1. Formatter
2. Linters
3. Drag and drop
4. WCAG Validations
5. Emmet Abbrevationâ€™s
6. Emmet Previewer
7. Search
8. API Json viewer
9. HTML viewer
10. CSS file viewer
11. JS file viewer
12. SVG file viewer
13. XML viewer
14. DOM inject
15. DOM Viewer
